Luke Howard

Artist

Luke Howard is an Australian Music Prize long-listed composer signed to UK label Mercury KX. He has toured extensively internationally and released several records, including the ARIA-nominated All That Is Not Solid and The Sand That Ate The Sea. He has worked with film and theatre extensively, working amongst others with Back To Back Theatre and the Royal Ballet in Covent Garden. Luke is one of Australiaâ€™s foremost practitioners of contemporary classical music whose work continues to captivate audiences worldwide.
